body:
There are currently (at least) three places in the documentation that mention containers:
1. https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/containers.html (the new and fancy `spack containerize` but does not mention how containers can actually be built from the Dockerfile)
2. https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/workflows.html#using-spack-to-create-docker-images (old manual approach, can probably be replaced by 1.)
3. https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/docker_for_developers.html (this is a different use case but does not work at all since the config files are gone now)
title: Container documentation inconsistent
